testsuite.name: testcases.TC_01_AddEmployee
testsuite.system-out: Orange HRM website is loaded Browser window is maximized Admin is entered as UserName in a text-box Admin@123 is entered as Password in a text-box Login button is clicked Home page is displayed Selected PIM from the available options Selected add employee option Add Employee modal exists cfmYGyFirst-name entered in the text-box UTS is enered as middle name in the text-box nOOis enered as nalastme in the text-box Location dropdown button is clicked Number of locations available:28 Next button is clicked Personal details page is displayed Entered data in other Id field Nationality drop-down is clicked Australian is selected as nationality of the employee Option under marital status are 4 marital status drop-down is clicked Gender drop-down is clicked Gender is selcted as :Male Data entered in hobbies field Next button is clicked Employee details page is displayed Region drop-down is clicked Region-2 is selcted from the dropdown FTE drop-down is clicked 0.5 is selected from the dropdown Temporary department drop-down is clicked Sub unit-3 is selected from the dropdown Save button is clicked save buttonn is clicked Food selection radio button is clicked save button is clicked Emloyee list is seleced cfmYGy UTS nOO is selected as employee full name Employee name entered in search tab Employee selected from the dropdown cfmYGy UTS nOO Employee details exist Logout dropdown is clicked Successfully logged out of the browser
